title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama: chat history, multi-user, model management, RAG uploads, voice input.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, Spring Boot starters and reactive support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama REST API for Rails and scripting.

title: ollama-cli (mxyng/ollama-cli)
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI with syntax highlighting, conversation tree and shell completions.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Drop-in GitHub Copilot replacement using Ollama models inside VS Code via the Copilot extension API.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: fine-tune, quantize, deploy with Kubernetes, build voice bots, etc.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling and PVC support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Ready-made compose stacks bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres vector store and nginx TLS.

title: ollama-ex
summary: Elixir library exposing Ollama as a GenServer with back-pressure and telemetry.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Lightweight async Rust client using reqwest and serde; supports streaming and embeddings.

title: ollama-nestjs
summary: NestJS module providing decorators and dependency injection for Ollama services.

title: ollama-dart
summary: Dart/Flutter package to run local LLMs on desktop or mobile via Ollama backend.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama with LINQ-friendly chat builders and Blazor component examples.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-curated list of GGUF models pre-converted for Ollama with performance benchmarks.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and moderation.
